review: *** ******** ** ** ********* *************** I had bad experiences in the past with the dentists so was looking for the one who could provide me with best treatment this time and I luckily landed in the hands of right doctor. I don't think, I could get better treatment elsewhere than here. He is very friendly, kind and caring towards the patients. He is not only a good doctor but also a good person. I am very much satisfied and would highly recommend him. Siri dental has got very good team of doctors and I thank each and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would like to share my invisible aligners experience which I went through in Siri dental hospital. As I am in 30+ age I had so many doubts, whether the gaps between teeth will be decreased and get a proper shape. All my questions were properly explained and cleared my doubts. what I really like in invisible aligners is mainly its a painless treatment, less time than normal braces and not necessary to visit hospital every month. Now I am happy to say that I completed my treatment and I got proper smile. Thanks to Dr. N Srinivas and team Definitely I will recommend to visit this hospital for any dental issues.

Very Pleasant and Assuring.

What Amazed me pretty well is the painless experience/treatment is has given!! Goodness..he did so amazingly well and satisfying!! I never thought my this case could go easy and nice.

Results and experience are worth beyond the money,time and hope spent this Dr. N. Srinivas and his well caring team/staff!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Ceramic Dental Braces,Dental Braces Fixing,Ceramic Braces Fixing,
review: I have decided to get braces to fix my teeth. After a lot of research on Braces and hospitals, finally I have consulted Dr. N Srinivas, Siri Dental Clinic. Doctor has explained the teeth condition and treatment properly. He is very friendly and listens to problem patiently. I have decided to get Self Ligating Ceramic Braces as suggested by him. I had two of my pre-molar teeth removed. The extraction was done very smoothly and Iam not experiencing much pain. My treatment is under process. Iam very happy with the Team of Siri Dental Clinic.The Clinic is very Hygienic and staff are very polite.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Any doctor according to me should he able to easily converse with the patient, clearly tell about the problem and it's solution and take time to make sure the patient understood it clearly.Dr Srinivas makes ure the patient has no fear in asking any questions which usually doesn't happen, patients are ascared anyways and come to doctor's and just follow orders as per what doctor say but don't ask questions.I despise that and it doesn't help build doctor patient relationship.

The surgery I had was painless,I had two wisdom tooth a removed within a span of 5-10 min ,no pain whatsoever.Surely he is a professional at what he does and my praise wouldn't be necessary.

Thank you Dr Srinivas and team for helping me,wish you good luck.
reply_text:
Thank you for kind words shiva kiran 
Take care

review: Dr. Srinivas and his team of doctors is really good. I went there for implant fixation, bridge for two sides of the lower jaw. Fixing of bridge is completed satisfactorily after RCT. Implant was fixed but there was a problem after fixing the crown. Today I visited again as the crown was loose and they could remove the crown and the implant was also removed as it became loose. I was to visit again after two months for refixing the implant. Over all I am quite happy with the treatment.

review:
Went here for regular teeth cleaning.

Everything is good and doctor who did the cleaning is good and gave suggestions for better teeth.

Only bad thing is staff who helps to take out the cleaned water, they are not doing good job and 90% of the time, they didn't stay while cleaning is going on and whole cleaned water flew through shirt.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with doctor  sriniwas was to me, without looking my gums problem he started to convince me regarding my tooth, and take full x- Ray etc, my gum was paining severely at that time,, when I told to check my gum problem, than he told his assistant doctor to write the medicine, without checking my gum. Hence I feel myself mistake to visit here.
reply_text:
Good morning mam
 you have presented with a swelling on left cheek with pain and inability to open the mouth even for checking 
the cause of infection about opening was limited also you have gum infection in the front Teeth
also 
 to add it to this,  you gave history of self medication for pain earlier days 
when we asked for taking an x-ray OPG, that shows the cause and extent of the infection lesion, your father wanted some immediate pain relief measures and not X-ray, so we just prescribed antibiotics and analgesics which can provide immediate relief but treatment has to be started immediately
 please let us know if someone treated you without seeing an x-ray 
coming to commercial angle we didn‚Äôt start any treatment at all and then suggest that any as we didn‚Äôt come to a diagnosis first 
and the junior doctor is MDS periodontist , who is specialist in gums 
thank you for the review

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was made to wait for 2hours (1hr 50mins) for a treatment which lasted less than 10 mins. I had to wait not because there was crowd but because (I guess) I was an old orthodontic patient who went there to fix my fixed retainers. The receptionist kept sending patients inside who came after me, keeping me waiting.
PS: Selected ‚Äòdoctor friendliness‚Äô only because I can‚Äôt submit without selecting anything otherwise I would‚Äôve selected none:)
reply_text:
Hi
Sorry for making you wait
Reason is not that you‚Äôre old patient but each doctor does specific specialist work and the one who needs to attend you had patients already in queue
Also we have 5 chairs and 5 doctors but sometimes on weekends we see sudden rush of patients
And we generally don‚Äôt give appointments and try to finish then and there itself most of the times
As you‚Äôve been our orthodontic patient, you must ve beem aware of our clinic system and protocols 
Anyways, we re once again sorry for the inconvenience
